items.question: What type of images work best for gesture generation?
items.answer: High-quality product images with clear backgrounds yield the best results. The more precise and well-lit, the better the animated gesture.

items.question: Can I customize the gestures and animations?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can describe how you want the animation to look, tailoring it specifically to your product and branding needs.

items.question: Is prior animation experience necessary?
items.answer: No prior experience is required. Our intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to create stunning animations.

items.question: How quickly can I generate animated gestures?
items.answer: The generation time is rapid—typically within seconds, allowing for efficient workflows and quick iterations.

items.question: Do the generated animations have commercial rights?
items.answer: Yes! You retain full commercial rights to the animations created, enabling you to use them across various platforms without restrictions.

items.question: What formats do the animations come in?
items.answer: Animations can be exported in multiple formats suitable for web, social media, and other digital platforms.

items.question: Can I create multiple gestures at once?
items.answer: Yes, our platform supports batch processing, allowing you to design and generate multiple animated gestures simultaneously.

items.question: What support services are available?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive documentation, tutorials, and a support team to assist with any technical issues or inquiries.
